metadata.title: CVE-2017-0369 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a flaw, allowing asysops to undelete pages, although the page is protected against it.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-0369` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.27.4-3
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.27.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.4-3').
